list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a continuous flow of liquid, air, or gas.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Frank blew out a stream of smoke
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Frank thổi ra một dòng khói

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a continuous flow of data or instructions, typically one having a constant or predictable rate.
(of liquid) run or flow in a continuous current in a specified direction.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she sat with tears streaming down her face
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ngồi với nước mắt chảy xuống mặt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: transmit or receive (data, especially video and audio material) over the internet as a steady, continuous flow.
